modName: Riverwood Starter Packs for Warriors _ Thieves _ Mages
summary: Beginners starter packs for Warriors, Thieves and Mages
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]These starter packs are  for those that want to play the vanilla way ( escape from Helgen) or anyone that wants to mess around with the console commands and be like a new character again, these stater packs are located in the Riverwood Trader on the second floor in 3 different chests ( see screenshots), the following items are include:[/size]

[color=#f4f4f4][size=4]WARRIOR[/size][/color]

[list]
[*][color=#f1c232][size=3]Gold x 1500[/size][/color]
[*][color=#76a5af]Lockpick x 5[/color]
[*][color=#6aa84f][size=3]Potion of Cure Disease x 5[/size][/color]
[*][color=#6aa84f][size=3]Potion of Vigorous Healing x 10[/size][/color] 
[*][color=#6aa84f][size=3]Potion of Vigorous Stamina x 10[/size][/color]
[*][color=#6aa84f][size=3]Cure Posion  x 5[/size][/color]
[*][color=#6aa84f][size=3]Elixir of True Shot x 3[/size][/color]
[*][color=#6aa84f][size=3]Philter of the Beserker x3[/size][/color]
[*][color=#00ffff][size=3]Cooked Beef x 3[/size][/color]
[*][color=#00ffff][size=3]Goat Wheel Cheese x 3[/size][/color]
[*][color=#00ffff][size=3]Nord Mead x 3[/size][/color]
[*][color=#00ffff][size=3]Red Apple x 5[/size][/color]

[*][color=#cc4125][size=3]Steel Greatsword x 1[/size][/color]
[*][color=#cc4125][size=3]Steel Arrows  x 50 [/size][/color]
[*][color=#cc4125][size=3]Imperial Bow x 50 (Was meant to be only 1...sell the rest)[/size][/color]
[/list][size=4][color=#dd7e6b]  [/color][color=#f4f4f4]MAGE [/color][/size]
